version_description:
add my orders
fix bugs

New design for Home Screen you can now see your Awaiting Balance ,Awaiting Transfer and Total Monthly Transaction.
fix bugs and improve performance
تصميم جديد للشاشة الرئيسية حيث يمكنك الآن مشاهدة رصيدك المتوفر والمعاملات المنتظرة وقيمة المعاملات الشهرية
تحسينات عامة في أداء التطبيق

- Add Widget for recent orders.
- Redesign product list in create invoice screen.
- Fix bugs and enhancement in all app.

add my orders
fix bugs

- Add Widget for recent orders.
- Redesign product list in create invoice screen.
- Fix bugs and enhancement in all app.

Receive push notification
Create shipping product
Update order status
Request pickup for ready orders
Unpaid orders
Support iPad
Support Apple watch

Add shipping settings screen.
Redesign registration screen.
Fix bugs and enhancement in all app.

• Attaching file when creating invoice.
• Fix bugs and enhancements improvements.

1- For your convenience, now you can manage the push notifications for the application and specify which category you seek to be notified for
2- You can now select the invoice language while creating the invoice
3- As always, we do our best efforts to provide more stable release and fixing stuff under the hood

• This is the last release that will support iOS 10, and thus the last version that will run on 32-bit devices such as the iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, and fourth-generation iPad. To continue receiving updates, please upgrade to iOS 11.1 or later.

• For your convenience, now you can manage hourly deposit service requests .
• You can now refund invoices , list old refunds and check new refunds status .
• As always, we do our best efforts to provide more stable release and fixing stuff under the hood.
